rules_msg.content: Please carefully read through the rules below. React with ✅ to accept and continue.

embed.title: Server Rules
embed.description:
1) **Respect & Kindness**: Treat all members with respect. Harassment, hate speech, or any form of discrimination is strictly prohibited.

2) **No Toxic Behavior**: Trolling, personal attacks, or intentionally disruptive behavior will not be tolerated.

3) **Zero Tolerance for Hate**: Racist, sexist, homophobic, or otherwise hateful language results in immediate action.

4) **Relevant Topics**: Keep conversations on-topic for each channel. Off-topic posts belong in the appropriate sections.

5) **No Spam or Self-Promotion**: Excessive advertising, spamming, or posting referral codes without permission is not allowed.

6) **Follow Discord TOS**: All users must adhere to Discord’s Terms of Service and Community Guidelines.

7) **Staff Decisions**: Moderators and admins have the final say. If asked to stop or move a conversation, comply promptly.

We appreciate everyone’s cooperation to keep this server a friendly, welcoming place. Enjoy your time here!
embed.footerText: Thanks for reading & following our rules!

server_info_msg.content: Welcome to the server — here's everything you need to know to get started!

embed.title: 🪷 Welcome to Varietyz
embed.description:
**Your adventure starts here.**

Varietyz is the official community hub for all things tied to our YouTube channel — from cinematic OSRS music video guides to ADHD-friendly PvM content and meme-fueled parody events.

Whether you're a Nervous Noob or a Maxed PvMer, there's a place here for you.

Here's what you'll find:

🎬 **MV-G Production** — Behind-the-scenes looks, lore, and community cameos.
📚 **PvM Guides** — Bite-sized boss guides made for Busyscapers.
🤡 **Parody Events** — Light-hearted chaos, custom outfits, and themed boss rushes.
🏆 **Clan Activities** — Join clan events, bossing nights, and skilling competitions.
🔒 **Progression Roles** — Earn ranks from 👶 Nervous Noob to 💀 Maxed PvMer.

This server evolves alongside the channel. Your voice helps shape what comes next.
embed.footerText: React in #verification to begin your journey 🌱
